ee kiyanne sama deyakma ee thula athi pathi gananawa ekineka athara gatumak saha eekathwayak nisa pawathinawa, ema pathiwala gatena aakaraya wenas wu wita deya wenas wenawa kiyana apohaka bhauthikawadi wiga්raha ka්ramayak misak wena deyak neweyi.

hawasa pahamara withara kiyanne hamuduruwaru the bona welawa.kiyawa kiyawa inna pothath paththakin thiyala, mamath samanera unnaseth yanawa dana shalawa paththata.unnanselata wathura rath karannayi anith kalamana lasthi karannayi.the bona welawata hamoma ekathuwela katha baha karanawa.boho welawata loku hamuduruwo durakathaneta uththara denna ee welawata.mamath, mata thibuna prashna ehema godak ee welawata ahanawa.unnanse harima upekshawen eewata uththara denawa.

thama balayata paminimata pera siti rajya nayakayin samaga prabhakaran athi kara gath eeniya sama giwisum saha satan wirama mema prashnayata sthirasara wisandumak nowana bawa watahagena siti janadhipathiwaraya thrasthawadaya yuddhayenma nathikara damiya yuthuya yana sthawarayehi sitiyada lowata ee bawa nopenwa sama kriyadamaya thawaduratath gena yamata sudanam bawa penwiya.
madhuranga asalwasiyo kiyala lipiyak dala thibuna.

antharjalayata anuwa absinth madhya yuropaye switsarlanthaya ha bohimiyawe nirmanayak.
widurata akamathi wenna hethuwak mata thibune naha.

thaniyama nemeyi duwalath ekka.
sundara kandu gatayak matha pihiti ehi me wana wita pawul 35k pamana jiwath wethi.
oya godak lassanata eeka karala thiyanawa.
diwa ra, somnasin !
iraj wirarathna wisin siya fesbuk pituwe samalingika prajawage ayithiwasikam wenuwen palakara thibenawa.
wyanjanayak lesa piliyela kala haki mal warga saha kola warga kament karamuda?
rajya sampath wikuna damima hara an kisidu karyayak nokala age eekayana aramuna wuye eekiyabhawaya nathi kirimaya.
lankawen labu pilithuru lipiya api paryeshanagarayata idiripath kelemu.
ee wenakota ethuma ithama karyabahulayi.
ohuge katayuthu kohomada kiyala pariksha karala balanna .
wena kohen hoyaganna da?” →

mata neshans trast bankuwen ewapu lipiye eeka pahadiliwa gahala thibuna ithirikirime bankuwe ehema nathuwada danne na 2013 juni 19 dina 07:58 ta obe lipiyath samanga mama ekanga wemi.mokada oya wage athdakim walata mamath muhuna dunna.wishwawidyala praweshalath sisusisuwiyanta laba dun nayakathwa puhunuwedi ethana siti goda denek thamange jathika hadunum path ankaya,wibhaga ankaya,gedara lipinaya dana nositina ladi.owunge mathakaye radi thibenne wena wena bahubutha. 2013 juni 19 dina 08:07 ta mata kopamana galmul aawath eka deyak kiwayuthuyi gayani.

mema adahasa shlifan thula ketharam thadin palapadiyam wi thibbeda yath ohu siya marana manchakayedi "monawa kalath dakunatha pasa shakthimath karanna" yayi pawasu baw sandahan ya. 1913 di sidu wu shlifange maranin pasu ohuge thanathurata path wuye wadimahalu moltkege bana wu helmuth fon moltke (kanishta) ya.

ema awasthawedi esawiya yuthu nila dhajaya kumakda yana prashnaya thawath matha harambaayakata thududun athara deshapalanagnyayo wiwidha, paraspara wirodhi adahas pala karamin prashnaya wadath awul kalaha. 1947 desambar 22 dakwama me sambandhayen rajaye nishchitha prathipaththiyak nothibu bawa mathisabedi nagu prashnayakata agramathyawaraya dun pilithuren heli wiya.
dawul sadde langama ahenawa.

ganho diyakadithi kimidathi rosa, ath dala pa saumya wan gal kata saha ranwan miniran kabali, owun onchilla padina puswal asala wati athi madata pa puswal ata, thanin thana sangawathi madatiya saha olindata owunge wasthu pettin pata patin wisithuru kaleya.

mema pathwimata pera ohu 1990 sita 2015 dakwa shri lanka waraya adhikariye, habarmastar, meheyum adhyaksha saha kalamanakarana adhyaksha lesa sewaya kara atha. 1970 saha 1980 dashaka waladi ohu samanya bhanda, thoga, bahalum, thel saha gas tanki wani muhudu naw wishala pramanayaka meheyum waladi kapithan lesa sewaya kota athi ohu samudriya karamanthaya gana hasala danumaththeku lesa prakataya.

thama papandu kandayamata ella wu thrasthawadi praharaya walakwimata apohosathwima padanam karagena togo rajyaya wisin aprikanu papandu sammelanayata erehi wa ansha usawiyaka naduwak gonu karanu labuweya.pasugiya masaye di pawathi aprikanu kusalana tharagawaliya aarambhaye togo papandu pilata ella wu thrasthawadi praharayen ema kandayam samajikayan dedeneku marumuwata path wuha.anathuruwa tharagamalawa athahara perala paminimata togo rajaya wisin thama papandu pilata niyoga kala athara tharagawaliya athahara aapasu siya rata bala yama nisa 2012 saha 2014 wasarawala di pawathwimata niyamitha aprikanu kusalana papandu tharagawali sandaha togo kandayamata thahanamak panawimata aprikanu papandu sammelanaya thiranaya kaleya.me siyalu karunu padanam kara ganimin me naduwa gonu kota thibena athara in togo kandayamata wadi wasi gena denu athayi wartha wiya.
